annotation.description: Defines the label that will be used in the Query Explorer for the pattern's matches.
annotation.name: PatternUI

annotationparameter.description: This message will appear for each match of the pattern. The message may refer the parameter variables between $ symbols, or their EMF features, such as in $Param1.name$."
annotationparameter.name: message

annotation.description: Defines observable values for the pattern's parameters; the code generator will create accessors for such values to use in databinding contexts.
annotation.name: ObservableValue

annotationparameter.description: The name of the observable value.
annotationparameter.name: name

annotationparameter.description: This expression defines the attribute of a pattern parameter for which the IObservableValue will be created.
annotationparameter.name: expression

annotation.description: The annotation defines whether the pattern should appear in the Query Explorer's Pattern Registry.
annotation.name: QueryExplorer

annotationparameter.description: Possible values: "true" to display and "false" to not display.
annotationparameter.name: display

annotation.description: Annotate a pattern with OrderBy to define ordering between matches displayed in the Query Explorer.
annotation.name: OrderBy

annotationparameter.description: The ordering will be evaluated based on the given key with the form of "Key.someAttribute".
annotationparameter.name: key

annotationparameter.description: Possible values: "asc" for ascending order and "desc" for descending order.
annotationparameter.name: direction
